page.syntax: New_String as C = *LINE_INSERT(text as c,insert as c,line as n)

argument.name: New_String
argument.description: The modified text containing line insertion(s).

argument.name: line
argument.description: The number of the first line to replace. Numeric

page.description: Insert line(s) into text at line position.
page.discussion: The *LINE_INSERT() function inserts line(s) into a string starting at the line position defined by Start_Line.
page.example: lines = <<%str% one two three four %str% ? *line_insert(lines, "TWO AND A HALF", 3) = one two TWO AND A HALF three four
